1 # !/usr/local/bin/python3
2 
3 import networkx as nx
4 import numpy as np
5 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
6 from geometry_msgs.msg import PoseArray, Pose
7 from std_msgs.msg import Header
8 import yaml
9 import os
10 import math
11 
12 class OsmUtil():
13  """OsmUtil
14  This module contians the graph file, center point and scale
15  It maps the gps coordinate to xy coorindates
16  """
17 
18  def __init__(self,path):
19  """
20  @param path String
21  Retrives the node graph, center reference point and scale from the path
22  """
23  parent = os.path.dirname(path)
24 
25  with open(path) as file:
26  yaml_data = yaml.load(file)
27 
28  gpickle_file = os.path.join(parent,yaml_data['gpickle_file'])
29 
30 
31  self.G = nx.read_gpickle(gpickle_file)
32  self.center = yaml_data['center']
33  self.scale = yaml_data['scale']
34 
35  def angle_between(self,p1, p2):
36  """
37  Calculates the angle between 2 points
38  @param p1 tuple (x,y)
39  @param p2 tuple (x,y)
40  @return b float
41  """
42  b = np.arctan2(p2[1]-p1[1],p2[0]-p1[0])
43  return b
44 
45  def getPathPoints(self,nodes):
46  """
47  Generates the list of points from one node to another
48  @param nodes list of nodes
49  @return list of points
50  """
51  for node in nodes:
52  if node not in self.G:
53  return None
54 
55  if(len(nodes) == 1):
56  return [[self.G.nodes[nodes[-1]]['x'],self.G.nodes[nodes[-1]]['y']]]
57 
58  pointsPath = np.empty([0,2])
59  for i in range(len(nodes)-1):
60  node1 = nodes[i]
61  node2 = nodes[i+1]
62  points = self.G.edges[(node1, node2)]['points']
63  # Check starting point
64  if(np.all(((self.G.nodes[node1]['x'],self.G.nodes[node1]['y']) != points[0]))):
65  points = points[::-1]
66  pointsPath = np.append(pointsPath,points,axis=0)
67 
68  uniq, index = np.unique(pointsPath,axis=0, return_index=True)
69  return uniq[index.argsort()]
70 
71  def getGoalArray(self,points):
72  """
73  Adds heading to the points
74  @param points list of points
75  @return list of goals
76  """
77  GoalArray = []
78  heading = 0
79  if(len(points) == 1):
80  GoalArray.append([points[0][0],points[0][1],heading])
81  return GoalArray
82 
83  for i in range(len(points)-1):
84  p1 = points[i]
85  p2 = points[i+1]
86  heading = self.angle_between(p1, p2)
87  GoalArray.append([p1[0],p1[1],heading])
88  GoalArray.append([p2[0],p2[1],heading])
89  return GoalArray[::-1]
90 
91  def get_quaternion_from_euler(self,roll, pitch, yaw):
92  """
93  Converts heading from euler to quaternion
94  @param roll float
95  @param pitch float
96  @param yaw float
97  @return quaternion as a list in the form (x, y, z, w)
98  """
99 
100  qx = np.sin(roll/2) * np.cos(pitch/2) * np.cos(yaw/2) - np.cos(roll/2) * np.sin(pitch/2) * np.sin(yaw/2)
101  qy = np.cos(roll/2) * np.sin(pitch/2) * np.cos(yaw/2) + np.sin(roll/2) * np.cos(pitch/2) * np.sin(yaw/2)
102  qz = np.cos(roll/2) * np.cos(pitch/2) * np.sin(yaw/2) - np.sin(roll/2) * np.sin(pitch/2) * np.cos(yaw/2)
103  qw = np.cos(roll/2) * np.cos(pitch/2) * np.cos(yaw/2) + np.sin(roll/2) * np.sin(pitch/2) * np.sin(yaw/2)
104 
105  return [qx, qy, qz, qw]
106 
107  def convertToRosMsg(self,goals):
108  """
109  Converts goals to ros message
110  @param goals list of goals
111  @return PoseArray
112  """
113  msg = PoseArray()
114  msg.header = Header()
115  msg.header.frame_id = "odom"
116  pose_list = []
117 
118  print(goals)
119 
120  for goal in goals:
121  pose_msg = Pose()
122  pose_msg.position.x = goal[0]
123  pose_msg.position.y = goal[1]
124  pose_msg.position.z = 0
125  q = self.get_quaternion_from_euler(0,0,goal[2])
126  pose_msg.orientation.x = q[0]
127  pose_msg.orientation.y = q[1]
128  pose_msg.orientation.z = q[2]
129  pose_msg.orientation.w = q[3]
130 
131  pose_list.append(pose_msg)
132 
133  msg.poses = pose_list
134  return msg
135 
136 
137  def getGoals(self,nodes):
138  """
139  Converts list of nodes to goals in ros message format
140  @param nodes list of nodes
141  @return PoseArray
142  """
143  try:
144  points = self.getPathPoints(nodes)
145  goals = self.getGoalArray(points)
146  return self.convertToRosMsg(goals)
147  except:
148  return None
149 
150  def convertToLngLat(self, point):
151  """
152  Converts xy point to GPS coordinate
153  @param point tuple (x,y)
154  @return gps coordinate tuple (lon,lat)
155  """
156 
157  x = point[0]*(1/self.scale)
158  y = point[1]*(1/self.scale)
159 
160  R = 6371009
161  brng = np.arctan2(x,y)
162  d = np.linalg.norm((x,y))
163 
164  lat1 = math.radians(self.center['lat']) #Current lat point converted to radians
165  lon1 = math.radians(self.center['lon'])
166 
167  lat2 = math.asin( math.sin(lat1)*math.cos(d/R) +
168  math.cos(lat1)*math.sin(d/R)*math.cos(brng))
169 
170  lon2 = lon1 + math.atan2(math.sin(brng)*math.sin(d/R)*math.cos(lat1),
171  math.cos(d/R)-math.sin(lat1)*math.sin(lat2))
172 
173  lat2 = math.degrees(lat2)
174  lon2 = math.degrees(lon2)
175 
176  return(lon2,lat2)
